author: COMSOL
description: The common electroanalytical method of exhaustive amperometric detection in a microscopic thin layer is modeled as a 1D-symmetric diffusion problem. The simulated result agrees with the analytical Cottrell equation at short times, and deviates as expected at long times when the diffusion layer spans the thin layer cell.
label: thin_layer_chronoamperometry.mph
name: root

settings.name: curvedinterior

description: Initial values of variables solved for

description: Values of variables not solved for
settings.name: usesol

settings.description: Allow complex-valued output from functions with real input

settings.description: Stop when undefined mathematical operation is detected

settings.description: Parallel Direct Sparse Solver for Clusters
settings.name: clusterpardiso

settings.name: bwinitstepfrac

settings.description: Store solution before and after events

title: Thin Layer Chronoamperometry
